author: inthedark.org
install_msg:
Thanks for installing the applications cog.
The cog itself is in **BETA** testing even tho most of the features may be available and working fine right now.
Ping @Seina in the #support_seina-cogs channel in the official Cog Support server if you're having any problem with the cog or have any suggestion.
name: Applications
short: Create custom applications for your server. [ BETA ]
description: Create custom applications such as Staff Application, Event Manager Application, Trail Mod Application, etc...
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores End User Data.
